src_original: jambūdvīpe bhadanta catasraḥ parṣada ākāṅkṣanti bhagavato darśanam* /
yena devās trāyastriṃśā jambūdvīpam avatareyur bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkramituṃ paryupāsanāya /  sādhu bhagavān devebhyaś trāyastriṃśebhyo 'vatared anukampām upādāya /
tgt_original: 願尊愍念世間，以時下到閻浮利。

src_original: bhagavān āha:  tena hi tvaṃ gaccha maudgalyāyana jambūdvīpam* /
avatariṣyati bhavanto bhagavān itaḥ saptame divase devebhyas trāyastriṃśebhyo jambūdvīpaṃ sāṃkāśye nagare āpajjure dāve udumbaramūle iti //
tgt_original: 『佛却後七日，當從天上來下，安詳會於優曇滿樹下。
